quest.name: But I Hardly Noah
journal: Syele looks as though she has lost someone.

It has transpired that Koh Rabntah, a member of the Sons of Saint Coinach, has gone missing. She was last seen carrying a strange orb from the Crystal Tower, and Syele surmises her friend left to seek something in Revenant's Toll. Make your way there in search of the wayward researcher.

You find Koh Rabntah standing about, only to discover she is not herself. The fascinating orb the researcher stumbled upon contained the soul of Noah, archmagus of Allag. Unable to resist the chance to walk again in the world, Noah then possessed Koh Rabntah. In so doing, she learns of NOAH, the group that bears her name, and now wishes to see what the organization has accomplished. With a promise to inform Syele of Koh's safety, Noah bids you show her your exploits within the Crystal Tower─in exchange for a token of her knowledge. Speak with her again should her offer intrigue you.
objectives: * This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon it.

dialogue.name: SYELE
dialogue.text: Adventurer, may I ask a favor of you?

dialogue.name: SYELE
dialogue.text: I am sorry to trouble you so soon after your trials in the Crystal Tower, but my colleague Koh Rabntah has gone missing.

dialogue.name: SYELE
dialogue.text: She discovered the oddest orb deep within the tower, and said she was returning here to analyze it. No one has seen her since─though she is too timid a girl to have run off with her find.

dialogue.name: SYELE
dialogue.text: She probably just left to gather artifacts or materials in Revenant's Toll for her studies. But all the same, could you go and look for her there? I cannot shake the feeling something has befallen her...

dialogue.name: SYELE
dialogue.text: Have you found Koh yet? I suspect she has simply gone to Revenant's Toll in search of artifacts. Pray bid her return if you see her there.

dialogue.name: KOHRABNTAH
dialogue.text: ...Is there something I can help you with?

dialogue.name: KOHRABNTAH
dialogue.text: You seek Koh Rabntah? Well, you have found the right body, but she is not at home...so to speak.

dialogue.name: KOHRABNTAH
dialogue.text: This lovely girl you see before you is known as “Koh.” But another's soul dwells within her at present─mine, to be precise.

dialogue.name: KOHRABNTAH
dialogue.text: You are speaking with none other than Noah, archmagus of Allag! My scholarly works are legend, my treatises of the cosmos priceless, and my very name known throughout the world!

dialogue.name: KOHRABNTAH
dialogue.text: ...Or 'twas so once. My soul has whiled away the millennia within an orb. Koh awoke me from my slumber, and... Well, how could I pass up a chance to walk the world again? So I allowed my spirit to flow into her body, and here we are.

dialogue.name: KOHRABNTAH
dialogue.text: ...Hm. Forgive me, but you do not seem overly bewildered by this. Would I be wrong to assume you belong to the scholarly fellowship that carries my name?

dialogue.name: KOHRABNTAH
dialogue.text: As I thought. Koh revealed this “NOAH” when I entered her mind. Oh, but do be at ease─I bear you no ill will for using my name.

dialogue.name: KOHRABNTAH
dialogue.text: I am, however, intrigued. What discoveries has this organization made? Has it made any findings of note to begin with?

dialogue.name: KOHRABNTAH
dialogue.text: You act in my name, and so are as disciples to me. I will give you my blessing after you have proven your intellectual worth. Such is my wont. So, are you deserving?

dialogue.name: KOHRABNTAH
dialogue.text: You have dedicated yourself to creating a brighter future, eh? Then we may be alike in spirit. When I lived, I had a thirst for knowledge, and dedicated myself to understanding the world. 'Twas how I became an archmagus.

dialogue.name: KOHRABNTAH
dialogue.text: Hmmm... You may yet become a disciple of mine. I would learn more of your journey into the Crystal Tower. If I can see your dedication amongst your exploits, I will be happy to give you a token of my immense wisdom.

dialogue.name: KOHRABNTAH
dialogue.text: Pray do not expect too much, though: there are limits to what I can do in this body.

dialogue.name: KOHRABNTAH
dialogue.text: ...Whose owner you were seeking, of course. Well, I will make sure that Koh's friend learns of what has happened─some version, at least. And worry not: this body is in safe hands.

dialogue.name: KOHRABNTAH
dialogue.text: And I believe that is the shape of it. If my offer has tantalized you and you wish to prove yourself in my eyes, you certainly know where to find me.
